page.title: 12 ST. OSWALD CHURCH Cont....
page.content: attending to Parochial Church Council meetings. He did not think a visit by us would be rewarding, but he did give further information on events in Rockhampton. They held a pancake race-in snow and ice-on the Cricket field on Shrove Tuesday, and this now seemed to have become a tradition - or possibly a revival of an older one. They also took part in a celebration of 40 years of peace on May 8th in commemoration of VE Day 1945. This was well supported by young and old. They held a Confirmation service on Mothering Sunday, l7th March, the first one held there in the past seven years. They also hold a family service once a month which is attended by parents and children and this has become a growing point of the Church.
